justification: Proposal ignores Team B’s conservative, floor-first preferences and need for stable targets/touches. It asks B to give up a steady, high-target TE (Noah Brown) for two volatile committee RBs, misaligned with B’s risk profile. Rationale centers only on Team A’s playoff push and ‘consolidation,’ despite A already rostering a Tier 2 TE. The offer is feasible roster-wise but poorly targeted to B. Low p_accept is reasonable but not justified.
